name: INove (wordpress theme) Dark Text
description:
I like the INove theme, but I still do not like gray text. This lets me correct what I consider a flaw in what is otherwise a fine theme.

It can, of course, be used for other blogs using the same theme.
additional_info: 4/28/2011 - Added example for including another blog. Remember that your changes will get lost in an update, so keep a copy to put back afterward.
